text: Peter Brown (born 15 June 1949) is a former Australian rules footballer who played for Geelong in the Victorian Football League (VFL) in 1971. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Geelong Football Club players Category:Epping Football Club players Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia)
title: Peter Brown (Australian footballer, born 1949)
